oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Kitāb Fatḥ al-fayyāḍ fī ʻilm al-farāʼiḍ : manuscript, 1911
Fatḥ al-fayyāḍ fī ʻilm al-farāʼiḍ
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ibn al-Jammāl, ʻAlī ibn Abī Bakr ibn ʻAlī al-Anṣārī , 1594–1662
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Widener Library, Harvard University Widener Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Title translation : The Endowment of the Generous [i.e. God] regarding the Science of Inheritance.

Written surface: 10.5 x 17.6 cm; 23 lines to a page, in clear naskhi script in black ink, on beige paper, with headings, keywords, and markings in red. Many tables in black and red. Text: folios: 1b – 24a.
According to the colophon, copy completed on 17 Jumādá al-Ākhirah 1329 [June 15, 1911 AD] in the hand of ʻAbd al-Wahhāb ʻAbd Allāh Aḥmad al-Ḥ.l.d.rī.
Recent cloth, in excellent shape. No reference can be found for this manuscript, probably a unique one.
The book was originally written in 1065 AH [1655 AD].
MS Arab 431. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
